ticket.title: Some widget need optimization
ticket.original-body:
@@@ Started GET "/qor/widget/settings/4443/LS0tIHt9Cgo=@/1314849466/" for 175.41.242.254 at 2011-09-02 12:40:20 +0000 Country Load (0.3ms) SELECT `countries`.* FROM `countries` WHERE `countries`.`id` = 7 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `countries`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) LIMIT 1 Processing by Qor::Widget::SettingsController#show as HTML Parameters: {"id"=>"4443", "options_base64"=>"LS0tIHt9Cgo=@", "timestamp"=>"1314849466"} Qor::Widget::ViewSetting Load (0.6ms) SELECT `qor_widget_view_settings`.* FROM `qor_widget_view_settings` WHERE `qor_widget_view_settings`.`id` = 4443 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `qor_widget_view_settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) LIMIT 1 WidgetSetting Load (0.3ms) SELECT `widget_settings`.* FROM `widget_settings` WHERE `widget_settings`.`id` = 3975 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `widget_settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) ORDER BY position LIMIT 1 Qor::Widget::TemplateBundle Load (0.4ms) SELECT `qor_widget_template_bundles`.* FROM `qor_widget_template_bundles` WHERE `qor_widget_template_bundles`.`id` = 10095 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `qor_widget_template_bundles`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) LIMIT 1 WidgetSetting::ProductsFootwear Load (7.1ms) SELECT `widget_settings`.* FROM `widget_settings` WHERE `widget_settings`.`type` IN ('WidgetSetting::ProductsFootwear') AND `widget_settings`.`setting_id` = 3975 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `widget_settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) ORDER BY position LIMIT 1 WidgetSetting::ProductsFootwear Load (6.7ms) SELECT `widget_settings`.* FROM `widget_settings` WHERE `widget_settings`.`type` IN ('WidgetSetting::ProductsFootwear') AND `widget_settings`.`setting_id` = 3975 AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `widget_settings`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) ORDER BY position I18n::Backend::ActiveRecord::Translation Load (0.8ms) SELECT `translations`.* FROM `translations` WHERE `translations`.`locale` = 'de-de' AND (/* SOFT_DELETE_DEFAULT_SCOPE */ `translations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL) AND (`key` IN ('product_kinds.index.footwear') OR `key` LIKE 'product_kinds.index.footwear.%') Rendered /home/app/qor/widget/app/views/qor/widget/settings/show.html.erb (388.4ms) Completed 200 OK in 394ms (Views: 372.7ms | ActiveRecord: 17.4ms)
@@@
